ProductInfo.Features:
Very fast performance from a 1.3Ghz Dual Core Processor (twice as fast as a 1.5Ghz single core) for superb games and video performance.
Latest Android 4.2 Jelly Bean OS reveals new adventures. Get access to thousands of useful apps and fun games to download and install on you tablet with Google Play Store pre-installed. Micro SD card slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra space to store songs, videos, photos and other files.
Dual Camera Front 0.3M and Back 2MP, enjoy video chat with friends and family.
MTK6582 Dual Core Chipset, Support Dual Sim, and Qual Band GSM(850/900/1800/1900MHz), which provides a good and stable 2G network connection and high quality for phone call function.
Rich apps: Youtube/Facebook/Twitter/MSN/Android market/Skype/Calculator/Google Mail/Google maps/iReader/Quick Office. Be noted that this item is based on smart phone chipset, it does not support tablet keyboard case.
ProductInfo.Name: iDream Phablet Phone Dual Core Dual SIM 6.5"Capacitive Touch Screen Android 4.2 Jelly Bean WiFi Dual Camera 4GB FonePad Tablet PC(White)
